title: To Dance with Ugly People
description: “To Dance with Ugly People," tells the harrowing story of Dani Ransom's travels down several dark paths. She experiences the terror of the 1967 Detroit riots, the ravages of drug abuse during her first marriage and the psychological, fanatical and abusive love between her husband Dane and herself. Experience Dani Ransom “Living on the Edge.” Understand the narcissist hold by Dane on Dani. Witness the chaos of Dani Ransom’s mind. Can she save herself and overcome the shadows of darkness that follows her?
author: Lorene Stunson Hill
